actions.text: On agreeing to the Sherrill amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 401 - 19 (Roll no. 73).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sherrill amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 401 - 19 (Roll no. 73).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Ms. Sherrill.

description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 116-6 to state that child care providers may not provide child care under the bill if they employ an individual who has been convicted of a sex crime, an offense involving a child victim, a violent crime, a drug felony, or other offense the Secretary deems appropriate.
purpose: Amendment states that child care providers may not provide child care if they employ an individual who has been convicted of a sex crime, an offense involving a child victim, a violent crime, a drug felony, or other offense the Secretary deems appropriate.
